item.title: 特朗普盟友担心减税承诺因共和党内讧而面临风险
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的一派盟友对共和党人在党内斗争和战略争议中通过 2025 年全面税收法案的可能性表示怀疑。【原文：A faction of President-elect Donald Trump’s allies is harboring doubts about Republicans’ chances of passing a sweeping tax bill in 2025 amid party infighting and strategy disputes.】

item.title: 在 2,900 亿美元的抛售潮之后，外国人继续抛售巴西股票
item.description: 外国投资者不断从巴西股市撤资，原因是财政风险增加和利率上升使当地股市前景黯淡。【原文：Foreign investors keep pulling money out of Brazilian stocks as mounting fiscal risks and rising interest rates dim the outlook for local equities.】

item.title: 部长称 SpaceX 可补充意大利卫星能力
item.description: 国防部长吉多-克罗塞托（Guido Crosetto）说，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司有能力加强意大利的卫星业务。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX has the capability to enhance Italy’s satellite operations, Defense Minister Guido Crosetto said.】

item.title: 纽约州劳勒称提高 SALT 上限对纳税人至关重要
item.description: 美国众议员迈克-劳勒（Mike Lawler）抨击他的家乡纽约州开支过高，并表示他将推动当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提高州和地方税收减免的上限，这对该州的许多纳税人造成了伤害。【原文：US Representative Mike Lawler slammed his home state of New York for high spending and said he will push President-elect Donald Trump to raise the cap on state and local tax deductions hurting many of the state’s taxpayers.】

item.title: 随着关系解冻，印度和阿富汗寻求重启贸易谈判
item.description: 随着两国关系走向正常化，印度和阿富汗塔利班领导的政府将利用伊朗港口恢复双边贸易。【原文：India and Afghanistan’s Taliban-led government will use Iranian ports to revive bilateral trade as the two countries move to normalize relations.】

item.title: 摩根大通就 Viva Wallet 在希腊和英国提起两起诉讼
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. filed two new lawsuits over its investment in Greek fintech Viva Wallet in a messy dispute with its join venture partner Werealize.com Ltd.】

item.title: 贸易战担忧冲击南非兰特，引发 6 月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 由于投资者担心美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普可能会全面征收关税，南非兰特周三大幅走软，跌至七个月来的最低水平。【原文：The South African rand weakened sharply on Wednesday, sliding to its lowest level in seven months as investors worry about the possibility of sweeping tariffs from US President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 交易商评估交易所抑制波动政策，可可价格下跌
item.description: 洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc.【原文：Cocoa dropped to the lowest in more than a week as traders reassess their positions after Intercontinental Exchange Inc. took steps to tame market volatility.】

item.title: 经历糟糕的一年后，Orlen 投资者从红利策略中寻求慰藉
item.description: 波兰最大的上市公司 Orlen SA 将于 1 月 9 日发布其期待已久的战略，希望在令人失望的一年后与投资者重新建立联系，其中的甜头可能包括更坚定的股息指导。【原文：Poland’s largest listed company Orlen SA will publish its long-awaited strategy on Jan. 9 in a bid to reconnect with investors after a disappointing year, with sweeteners potentially including firmer dividend guidance.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩寻求在战后选举 2022 年以来的首任总统
item.description: 黎巴嫩立法者将于本周选举两年多来的首任总统，陆军司令约瑟夫-奥恩（Joseph Aoun）是领导这个饱受数月战争摧残的国家的两位主要候选人之一。【原文：Lebanese lawmakers will attempt to elect a first president in more than two years this week, with army commander Joseph Aoun one of the two main candidates to lead a country battered by months of war.】

item.title: 分析师称英国市场疲软唤起人们对 2022 年危机的回忆
item.description: 由于担心持续的通胀压力和政府支出的增加，英国市场出现了大范围的抛售，这引发了人们对 2022 年金边债券崩溃的回忆，分析师将这一走势描述为那次危机的一个缩影。【原文：The broad selloff in UK markets amid fears of persistent inflationary pressures and higher government spending are prompting memories of the 2022 gilt meltdown, with analysts describing the moves as a small version of that crisis.】

item.title: 美国主要国债收益率逼近 2023 年峰值，5% 指日可待
item.description: 随着通胀忧虑引发的抛售席卷全球债券市场，10 年期美国国债收益率跃升至 2023 年底以来的最高点。【原文：The yield on 10-year US Treasuries jumped toward its highest since late 2023 as a selloff fueled by inflationary angst gripped global bond markets.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示美国企业新增 12.2 万个就业岗位，为 8 月以来最少
item.description: 12 月份，美国私营部门的招聘和工资增长放缓，表明对工人的需求持续放缓。【原文：US private-sector hiring and wage growth slowed in December, indicating an ongoing moderation in demand for workers.】

item.title: 安哥拉推迟公务员加薪以偿还不断膨胀的债务
item.description: 安哥拉劳工国务秘书说，安哥拉将推迟三个月支付公共部门工人应得的加薪。【原文：Angola will delay the payment of increases due to public-sector workers by three months, the country’s secretary of state for labor said, as the oil-producer struggles with ballooning debt payments.】

item.title: 桥水扩大在中国的领先优势，在艰难一年中资产跃升 40
item.description: 去年，桥水联合咨询公司（Bridgewater Associates）凭借其多元资产策略的稳定回报，在动荡的市场中吸引了更多富有的本地客户，从而扩大了其在中国市场对全球同行的领先优势。【原文：Bridgewater Associates widened its lead over global peers in China last year, after its multi-asset strategy’s stable returns attracted more wealthy local clients in a volatile market.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒支持进一步减息，称通胀率正在走低
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，他认为通胀率将继续向央行设定的 2% 的目标降温，这促使他支持今年进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said he believes inflation will continue to cool toward the central bank’s 2% target, prompting his support for additional interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: Meta 推出 EBay 广告解决方案以遵守欧盟反垄断命令
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司提出在 Facebook Marketplace 上发布分类广告竞争对手 eBay 公司的列表，以遵守具有里程碑意义的欧盟反垄断命令，该命令附带 7.98 亿欧元（8.22 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. offered to publish listings from classified ads rival eBay Inc. on Facebook Marketplace in an effort to comply with a landmark European Union antitrust order that was accompanied by a €798 million ($822 million) fine.】

item.description:
美国的新发电能力开发商面临着涡轮机成本飙升和等待时间过长的问题。【原文：

item.title: 印度在高报黄金进口后修复创纪录的贸易赤字
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度政府在上个月发现黄金进口数据和贸易数据在计算过程中存在差异，目前仍在对这些数据进行最后修订。【原文：India’s government is still finalizing revisions to gold import figures and trade data after discovering discrepancies in their calculation last month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其防通胀里拉推动新兴市场最佳套利交易
item.description: 土耳其央行管理里拉的策略为交易者享受更多世界上最有利可图的套利交易奠定了基础。【原文：The Turkish central bank’s strategy for managing the lira is laying the ground for traders to enjoy even more of the world’s most profitable carry trade.】

item.title: 印度经济放缓加剧，8% 增长新纪元希望破灭
item.description: 多年来，印度蓬勃发展的经济使人们欣喜地认为，这个南亚国家已经进入了一个快速增长的新时代，推动其市场达到新的高度，并使人们期望它将在几十年内摆脱发展中国家的地位。【原文：For years, India’s booming economy fueled exuberance that the South Asian nation had entered a new era of faster growth, powering its markets to new heights and raising expectations it would exit the trenches of developing-nation status in a few decades.】

item.title: 借贷成本高企，巴西工业再次下滑
item.description: 巴西工业产值连续第二个月下降，表明在央行准备进一步提高利率之际，紧缩的金融条件正在对依赖信贷的工业造成影响。【原文：Brazil’s industrial output fell for the second straight month, signaling that tight financial conditions are taking toll on the credit-dependent sector as the central bank prepares to take interest rates even higher.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州颁布新法规限制医疗领域的私募股权投资
item.description: 根据马萨诸塞州州长莫拉-希利（Maura Healey）计划于周三签署的一项新法律，医疗保健行业的私募股权投资者将在马萨诸塞州面临更多监督。【原文：Private equity investors in the health-care industry will face additional oversight in Massachusetts under a new law that Governor Maura Healey plans to sign on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普对胰岛素和助听器出口国丹麦征收关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普经常对美国的主要贸易伙伴发出经济威胁。但周二他又瞄准了其中一个较小的贸易伙伴，警告说如果这个经济规模与密苏里州相当的国家拒绝他购买格陵兰岛的提议，他将 "对丹麦征收极高的关税"。【原文：Donald Trump regularly lobs economic threats at major US trading partners. But he took aim Tuesday at one of the smaller ones, warning that he’d “tariff Denmark at a very high level” if the country with an economy the size of Missouri’s resists his offer to buy Greenland.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率略低于 7%，阻碍了购房热情
item.description: 今年年初，美国抵押贷款利率升至略低于 7%的水平，购房申请指数跌至 2 月份以来的最低水平，这进一步证明了房地产市场正处于挣扎之中。【原文：US mortgage rates edged up to just shy of 7% at the turn of year and a gauge of home-purchase applications tumbled to the lowest level since February, adding to evidence of a struggling housing market.】

item.title: 阿克曼从特朗普交易中获利 1200%，但交易远未结束
item.description: 美国大选两个月后，特朗普最引人注目的交易不是比特币、特斯拉公司或其他可能的嫌疑人。相反，它是华尔街许多人早已遗忘的一家有着 87 年历史的老顽固公司的股票。【原文：Two months after the US election, the most spectacular of all Trump trades isn’t Bitcoin, Tesla Inc. or any other likely suspects. Rather, it’s shares of a stodgy, 87-year-old company many on Wall Street had forgotten about long ago.】
